Title: Manage upload files for SP 2010
Description: The feature is responsible for management uploading file size using file extensions (i.e: .txt), control upload document into library and attachments for lists.
HomeWiki:
Manage upload files for SP 2010 is a feature is responsible for management upload file size for specific extensions. The administrator can manage extensions (add/remove/edit). The feature will be installed on site collection only and can manage upload size files.

How does it work?


Source code is here: https://github.com/Fabiarm/spsmfiles/tree/master/2010

Version 1.0.0:
  • Manage upload file size on specific application page
  • Simple in use
  • Simple installation
  • Work on:
    • SharePoint Foundation 2010
    • Sharepoint Server 2010 (Standard, Enterprise)
  • Localized:
    • English
    • Russian

Requirements
  • For Use
    • Internet Explorer 8.0 and higher
    • FireFox 14.0 and higher
    • Chrome 22.0 and higher
  • For Development
    • IDE - Visual Studio 2010
    • SharePoint Foundation 2010 / SharePoint Server 2010 (Standard, Enterprise)
TagList: file size,sharepoint,sharepoint 2010,sharepoint file size,manage file size,
